Html:
I just played around a bit with the digital signing feature of MS Excel 2010 and would love to use this feature with PHPExel. Is there anything in the pipeline regarding such a feature in future releases?

Thanks a lot for your work! 

Amaridian
Nothing at this point, and the roadmap for the year ahead is pretty full; but raise it as an issue (feature request) and see how many people vote on it
